attributes.action: Charge VED based on the CO2 readings measured during the MOT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the VED (road tax) of a vehicle is based on the CO2 emissions measured by the manufacturer when the vehicle is new. It would be fairer to charge according to the CO2 actually measured during the MOT. This would encourage owners to keep their cars well serviced. The more you pollute the more you pay.
